headline: BizClik Launches January 2026 Technology Portfolio With New Insights on Ethical AI and Sustainability
summary: The first 2026 editions of AI Magazine, Technology Magazine, Telco Magazine, and Data Centre Magazine explore automation, sustainability, ethical AI, conscious AI and more London - 7 January 2026 - BizClik, a global B2B media and events company, has released the latest magazine editions of its Technology portfolio, featuring: Technology MagazineAI MagazineTelco MagazineData Centre Magazine The new issues spotlight global leaders, breakthrough technologies and strategies shaping the future of AI,

headline: Jefferies Names ServiceNow (NOW) AI Growth Winner, Reaffirms Buy
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the must-buy AI stocks to invest in. On December 22, Jefferies analysts identified ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) as one of the companies that are turning AI into real business growth. The firm acknowledged that ServiceNow faced multiple compression in 2025 due to investor doubts about keeping up 20% organic growth […]

headline: Jim Cramer on ServiceNow: “It Still Has a High Price-to-Earnings Multiple”
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer offered insights on. Highlighting its recent stock split, a caller asked if Cramer likes the stock at the current levels. He replied: “Well, the problem is that it is a software company and the software companies are being eaten by the hardware, some would say. […]

headline: Where Is ServiceNow (NOW) Headed According to the Street?
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the best strong buy stocks to invest in right now. On December 30, Canaccord Genuity reaffirmed a bullish stance on ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW), giving the stock a Buy rating with a price target of $224.00. In a separate development, ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) announced on December 23 that it entered […]
